title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors/Nets, the Staples Center Name Change, and An Interview With Mel Tucker
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors/Nets, the Staples Center Name Change, and An Interview With Mel Tucker
description:
The Draymond Green Show is here! In the first episode Draymond explains how the Warriors could’ve played even better against the Nets, why the Warriors doubters from the past few seasons were wrong, and his thoughts on the Staples Center getting a new name before interview Michigan State head football coach Mel tucker. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
